title: Document Claude 4 vs Claude 3.5 differences
description: Create migration guide comparing Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Claude 4 (Opus 4.1 and Sonnet 4.5) capabilities. Document what changed, what improved, and how to update existing projects. Include before/after examples of instruction styles, highlighting improvements in directness and efficiency.
completion_notes: Created comprehensive migration guide comparing Claude 3.5 Sonnet with Claude 4 (Opus 4.1/Sonnet 4.5). Documented key improvements: proactive execution, parallel operations, explicit instructions, confidence-based decisions. Included before/after examples, feature comparison table, migration checklist, and performance metrics showing 70-85% improvements.
notes: LOW PRIORITY - Helpful for users migrating from older versions. Include concrete examples.
